name: Mortar
description: ROM Downloader for RomM and Megathread
author: K-Wall

changelog.v2.5.0: Mortar now recognizes tagless ROM directories (e.g. /mnt/SDCARD/Roms/GBA). Small update to system mapping for finding Libretro Artwork.
changelog.v2.4.2: Small fix in UI library for artifacts that appeared when no bg.png is present.
changelog.v2.4.1: Just keeping dependencies up to date. I make enough technical debt myself... don't need to add to it.
changelog.v2.4.0: New settings to automagically group multi-disc games and BIN/CUE games. <3
changelog.v2.3.1: Added a setting to unzip ROM archive after download.
changelog.v2.2.1: Fix for a small bug in the fixed ROM folder discovery code.
changelog.v2.2.0: A quick fix that should address the weird ROM folder discovery issue. Fingers crossed!
changelog.v2.1.1: Upgraded the UI Library Dependency which brings system theme consistency and a new parallel download manager.
